text:
Migacore Technologies (EF 8) | Software Engineer or Machine Learning Engineer | London, UK | https://www.migacore.com | ONSITE

We’re a fast moving company that uses advanced machine learning techniques to understand how online interactions affect offline behaviour. Our first product dramatically improves demand forecasting for the air travel industry. Right now, 20% of airline seats fly empty, a multi-billion-dollar inefficiency; by leveraging both public and proprietary data to better understand when people will travel, Migacore Technologies can increase airline revenue while also lowering average ticket costs.

Roles we’re hiring for: Software and Machine Learning Engineers

https://angel.co/migacore/jobs

Feel free to get in touch via abheer [at] migacore.com too.
